entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:31 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 02:31 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3 except near zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3 except near zero along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 02:31 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
